name: Hole.io (itch)
description:
This is a remake of the game Hole.io for an University project. It was made in C++ with Raylib. The objetive of the game is to 'eat' all the objects on the map, when you eat something, your size increases and you move slower. The difficulty depends on the time you have to eat everything.

Movement

WASD, as simple as that!

Developer:

Godoy Tobias ("Gyts"), i made that game for an university subject, in addition to this i am studying videogames development in Buenos Aires, Argentina. 

Credits

Bonefires, palmtrees and trees by Warlock's Gauntlet artists.
